name: Mushroom Aioli Tostadas
description: A Spanish version of bruschetta: small rounds of toast spread with Saffron Garlic Aioli and topped with hot mushrooms. What could be better?

ingredients.name: olive oil, plus more for frying

preparation: Brush baguette slices with oil and place on parchment-lined Sheet Pan. Bake approximately 12 minutes, until golden.
Preheat frying pan over medium-high heat. Swirl pan with oil.

Add mushrooms and Herb & Garlic Dip Mix and cook approximately 10 minutes until liquid evaporates and mushrooms are lightly golden. Drizzle with lemon juice, season with Sea Salt and Black Pepper and stir.
Spread each toast with Saffron Garlic Aioli and top with hot mushrooms.

products.name: Herb & Garlic Dip Mix
summary: Classic notes of chives, parsley, & garlic.
